# Shuttle Brief
"An entertainment and food service shuttle, the Nightlight is also the Far Star Corporation's flagship biomass biorecombination research vessel. Providing top of the line hospitality and nutritional preperation accomidations for Nanotrasen standard xenotypes; the Nightlight should provide any research teams investigating new strains of recombinant nutrition with a distraction free crop of eager bioforms."
